structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Clerks, Attorneys And Other Officers Of Judicial Courts

law.catch_line: Credit Counseling Corporations, Applicability Of Secs. 46 To 46 C
law.text: The provisions of sections forty-six, forty-six A, forty-six B and forty-six C shall not apply to a corporation, or its agents, which has been organized under the provisions of chapter one hundred and eighty for the purpose of providing credit counseling.
